node.title: Back to Eden
node.description: In an age of advancement, the general feeling is that humanity is progressing towards some greater good in the future.  Perhaps, as we say in America, 'a more perfect union.'  However, the biblical Christian recognizes that humanity began in perfection and harmony with creation and its Creator.  Thus, we are not trying to go onward to some utopia but backwards to a place called Eden.  This message outlines God's ideal for humanity and how to get back to Eden through the experience of the first man to make it back there: Enoch.
